rewrite1: For the initial paragraph, set the outline to Level 1. Adjust the indentation on the right to -1 cm and make sure to turn off the italic formatting.
rewrite2: Begin with the first paragraph by setting it to Outline Level 1. Then adjust the right indentation, reducing it by 1cm, and ensure that the italic formatting is turned off.
rewrite3: Begin by formatting the initial paragraph with a Level 1 Outline. Then, adjust the right indent to -1cm, ensuring to remove any italic styling previously applied.
